views.markdown:
- Tested/Built on 6.0 -The "tilt" feature would not work on the previous version. If tilt was selected and the game was played, the game would be stuck as you cannot move out of the game state. This is fixed in this version, and the "tilt" feature is disabled for now -AdMob has been updated for 6.0
    v 2.0
  • loading screen
  • improved graphics
  • more info in settings
  • no white bar on icon anymore
